reviewText: So I just noticed this: The intern that opened the Daschle letter stated in her interview for FRONTLINE that she clipped off a corner off of the top of the Daschle letter by about a half an inch to open it and a white powder spilled out. But when you look at the photo of the Daschle letter, no corner is clipped.
This excellent DVD shows just how our government can bring to bear its resources to destroy its citizens unfairly. I first saw this on PBS and had to own it.
